selectOption: Please select an option to begin
TermP1: Welcome to our hotel. By proceeding with this self-service kiosk booking, you (Guest) agree to the following terms and conditions governing your stay at our hotel (Hotel). Please read these terms carefully before confirming your reservation.
TermP2: All guests must be at least 18 years of age to check in and register for a room. Valid government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in. The credit card used for booking must be presented by the cardholder. Room assignments are based on availability and cannot be guaranteed for specific room types or locations.
TermP3: A valid credit card is required for incidental charges, and an authorization hold will be placed on your credit card at check-in for the total room cost plus an additional amount for incidentals. Final payment for all charges will be processed at check-out. All rates are subject to applicable local and state taxes.
TermP4: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours prior to scheduled arrival time to avoid penalties. Late cancellations or no-shows will result in a charge equal to one night's stay plus applicable taxes. Modifications to existing reservations are subject to availability and may result in rate changes.
TermP5: Maximum room occupancy limits must be strictly observed for safety and security reasons. Quiet hours are from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Smoking is prohibited in all indoor areas, and a cleaning fee of $250 will be charged for violations. Pets are not permitted unless specifically booked in a pet-friendly room with applicable fees paid.
TermP6: The Hotel is not responsible for loss, theft, or damage to guest belongings. Guests will be held financially responsible for any damage to Hotel property during their stay. The Hotel reserves the right to charge the guest's credit card for any damages discovered after check-out.
TermP7: Personal information collected during booking will be processed in accordance with applicable privacy laws. Security cameras are in use in public areas for guest safety. Guest information will not be shared with third parties except as required by law.
TermP8: The Hotel reserves the right to refuse service to anyone for valid reasons. These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the state where the Hotel is located. The Hotel may terminate any reservation if these terms are violated.
TermP9: The Hotel is not liable for inability to provide services due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to natural disasters, civil unrest, or governmental regulations.
TermP10: By completing this kiosk booking, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms and conditions. You also confirm that you are authorized to accept these terms on behalf of all guests in your party.
TermP11: For assistance or questions about these terms, please contact our front desk staff.
